name: CPUCores :: Simple FPS Benchmark
detailed_description:
Update Notes

This Simple FPS Benchmark program is in early development and will be HEAVILY updated over time.


Buzz

Please click the "Add to your wishlist" and "Follow" button to track the progress of this DLC!


About the Game



CPUCores :: Simple FPS Benchmark will allow you to run a quick and simple benchmark on any game you want. This will allow you to record a game’s FPS & performance and it will automatically create graphs that will show you various information on the game and the performance.

You are easily able to see WHEN and WHAT caused your FPS to drop.
How? CPUCores :: Simple FPS Benchmark automatically creates graphs based on your FPS as well as what your CPU and CPU utilization during the game.

For example, if your FPS drops, you can see if your CPU or GPU was at max, giving a good indication of where a bottleneck may reside. This will give you good insights of what’s going on with your computer’s HARDWARE parts while playing a game, or the status of how optimized a game is.

Heavily Updated:

This Simple FPS Benchmark program is in early development and will be HEAVILY updated over time.

Current Screenshots (Will Be Updated Often):

supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Italian, Spanish, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Norwegian, Portuguese, Portuguese-Brazil, Romanian, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8 64-bit, Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Any CPU
  • Graphics: Any semi-modern GPU
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8 64-bit, Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Any CPU
  • Graphics: Any semi-modern GPU
